samples.name: Event counter
samples.description: With the combination of map and buffer operators we count the number of clicks on a button within 2 seconds

samples.name: Smart form
samples.description: CombineLatest operator helps to create a smarter login form

samples.name: Typing indicator
samples.description: This sample is very useful when you're building a chat application. Here we show the typing indicator if there are at least two characters and user keeps typing each character within three seconds.
